statements: UPDATE quality_control_test_results SET test_result = 'Pass' WHERE product_id = 123 AND test_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE quality_control_test_results SET product_id = 456, test_result = 'Fail' WHERE test_date = '2022-02-20';
UPDATE quality_control_test_results SET test_result = 'Pass' WHERE product_id = 123 AND test_date = '2022-01-15';
UPDATE quality_control_test_results SET test_date = '2022-02-20', test_result = 'Fail' WHERE product_id = 456;
UPDATE QualityControlTests SET test_result = true WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET product_type = 'Electronic' WHERE product_id = 3;
UPDATE QualityControlTests SET test_result = TRUE WHERE product_name = 'ProductA' AND test_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET product_type = 'NewType' WHERE product_name = 'ProductB';
UPDATE ProductQualityTestResults SET test_result = 'Pass' WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET product_category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_name = 'Laptop';
UPDATE ProductQualityTestResults SET test_result = 'Passed' WHERE test_id = 1;
UPDATE Products SET product_category = 'Electronics' WHERE product_id = 10;
UPDATE Product SET price = 25.50 WHERE name = 'Table';
UPDATE TestLimits SET min_value = 10.00, max_value = 100.00 WHERE test_name = 'Compression Test';

UPDATE TestDetails
SET test_value = 'Pass'
FROM TestDetails AS TD
INNER JOIN TestResult AS TR
ON TD.test_result_id = TR.id
WHERE TR.result = 'Fail';
UPDATE products SET product_description = 'Updated description' WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE test_results SET test_engineer = 'John Doe' WHERE result_id = 3;
UPDATE products SET product_description = 'Updated product description' WHERE product_id = 1
UPDATE test_results SET test_result = 'Fail', test_engineer = 'John Doe' WHERE result_id = 2
